name: CorFlags
help: The CorFlags Conversion tool allows you to configure the CorFlags section of the header of a portable executable image.

tasks.help: The CorFlags Conversion tool allows you to configure the CorFlags section of the header of a portable executable image.

properties.name: NoLogo
properties.help: Suppresses the Microsoft startup banner display.

properties.name: UpgradeCLRHeader
properties.help: Upgrades the CLR header version to 2.5. Note: Assemblies must have a CLR header version of 2.5 or greater to run natively.

properties.name: RevertCLRHeader
properties.help: Reverts the CLR header version to 2.0.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Forces an update even if the assembly is strong-named. Important: If you update a strong-named assembly, you must sign it again before executing its code.

properties.name: Assembly
properties.help: The name of the assembly for which to configure the CorFlags.
